author: franzoni
body:
- back port of skims DEFINITIONS from 75
- superceeds  #9867 , which can be closed
- rationalization of the skim matrix, intended to pass to T0 the PD => "skims to run" correspondence,
  in light of 2015 PD's , see https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/physics-announcements/3385.html
- collection of skims requirements by DPG/POG/PAGs : https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1OicL4b3jFUXalsk92GM9qLbNNAVklAGb7bf1T5BwZrY/edit#gid=0
- more local test running, will get back in a few hours
- to follow suit: forward porting to 7_5 and 7_6
                      relval tests, once this PR will have passed
                      integration in the ralval matrix, together with miniAOD - unscheduled
title: skims for 74
